payload.description: Create MobileEvidenceBlock.jsx - touch-optimized evidence block wrapper with always-visible actions. 48x48px drag handle with 6-dot pattern, wraps content in SwipeableBlock for swipe-to-delete. Props: block, onUpdate, onDelete, onTogglePrivate, dragHandleProps, isUploading, uploadProgress. Shows upload progress overlay when uploading.
payload.context: Uses TouchActionButton from ui/mobile for action buttons. Drag handle is 6 dots in 2x3 grid pattern. Always visible on mobile (not hover-only). Integrates with SwipeableBlock and UndoToast. Should use optio-purple/optio-pink colors. Min touch targets 44px.
